 26 
 27 require.def(
 28     'antie/devices/anim/css3/transition',
 29     [
 30         'antie/class',
 31         'antie/devices/anim/css3/transitionelement',
 32         'antie/devices/anim/css3/existingtransitiondefinition',
 33         'antie/devices/anim/css3/skipanimtransitiondefinition'
 34     ],
 35     
 36     function(Class, TransitionElement, ExisitingTransitionDefinition, SkipAnimTransitionDefinition) {
 37         "use strict";
 38         // var device;
 39         
 40         return Class.extend(
 41             {
 42                 /*
 43                  * A specific transition on an element from some values to some other values with associated callback
 44                  * @param {TransitionDefinition} transDef Defines the style of transition
 45                  * @param {EndPoints} endPoints Defines start, end and associated callbacks of the transition
 46                  * @param {Object} element the DOM element the transition is to be applied to
 47                  */
 48                 init: function(transDef, endPoints, element) {
 49                     var existingTransitions, combinedTransitions, shouldSkip;
 50                     
 51                     this._endPoints = endPoints;
 52                     this._completed = false;
 53                     this._transEl = new TransitionElement(element);
 54                     this._ownTransitions = transDef;
 55                     this._endFn = this._genTransEndFn();
 56                     
 57                     shouldSkip = this._isTransitionInstant();
 58                     
 59                     if(shouldSkip) {
 60                         this._ownTransitions = new SkipAnimTransitionDefinition(this._ownTransitions);
 61                     }
 62                     
 63                     combinedTransitions = new ExisitingTransitionDefinition(this._transEl);
 64                     combinedTransitions.addIn(this._ownTransitions);
 65                     
 66                     this._setInitialValues(); 
 67                     this._forceUpdate();
 68                     this._transEl.applyDefinition(combinedTransitions);               
 69                     this._transEl.setCallback(this._endFn);
 70                     this._forceUpdate();
 71                     this._doTransition();
 72                     
 73                     if(shouldSkip) {
 74                         this.stop(true);
 75                     }
 76                 },
 77                 
 78                 stop: function(skipToEnd) {
 79                     var currentStyle, currentProps, transitionTargets, prop, dummy, i;
 80                     if(!this._completed) {
 81                         
 82                         if(typeof skipToEnd !== 'boolean') {
 83                             skipToEnd = true;
 84                         }
 85                         if(skipToEnd) {
 86                             this._endFn();
 87                         } else {
 88                             transitionTargets = this._ownTransitions.getProperties();
 89                             currentStyle = this._transEl.getComputedStyle();
 90                             currentProps = {};
 91                             
 92                             for(i = 0; i !== transitionTargets.length; i += 1) {
 93                                 prop = transitionTargets[i];
 94                                 currentProps[prop] = currentStyle[prop] || 0;
 95                             }
 96                             
 97                             this._endFn();
 98                             this._forceUpdate();
 99                             
100                             for(i = 0; i !== transitionTargets.length; i += 1) {
101                                 this._transEl.setStylePropertyValue(prop, currentProps[prop]);
102                             }
103                         }
104                     }
105                 },           
106                 
107                 _setInitialValues: function() {
108                     var properties, origin, i, prop, value, currentStyle;
109                     properties = this._endPoints.getProperties();
110                     
111                     for(i = 0; i !== properties.length; i += 1) {
112                         prop = properties[i];
113                         origin = this._endPoints.getPropertyOrigin(prop);
114                         if(origin === undefined) {
115                             origin = this._transEl.getStylePropertyValue(prop) || this._endPoints.addUnitsToPropertyValue(prop, 0);
116                         }
117                         this._transEl.setStylePropertyValue(prop, origin);
118                     }
119                 },
120                 
121                 /* forces re-calc of style */
122                 _forceUpdate: function() {
123                     var transitionTargets;
124                     transitionTargets = this._ownTransitions.getProperties();
125                     if(transitionTargets.length > 0) {
126                         this._transEl.forceUpdate(transitionTargets[0]);
127                     }
128                 },
129                 
130                 _genTransEndFn: function() {
131                     var self;
132                     self = this;
133                     function endFn(evt) {
134                         var i, endEvents, endEvent, currentTransitions, resetTransitions;
135                         
136                         // check either called directly or event is firing for property on this transition
137                         
138                         if(!evt || self._ownTransitions.hasProperty(evt.propertyName)){
139                             self._completed = true;
140                             self._transEl.removeCallback(endFn);
141 
142                             resetTransitions = new ExisitingTransitionDefinition(self._transEl);
143                             resetTransitions.takeOut(self._ownTransitions);
144                             self._transEl.applyDefinition(resetTransitions);
145                             
146                             if(typeof self._endPoints.getOnCompleteCallback() === 'function') {
147                                 self._endPoints.getOnCompleteCallback()();
148                             } 
149                             
150                             //device.removeClassFromElement(device.getTopLevelElement(), "animating");
151                             //device.addClassToElement(device.getTopLevelElement(), "notanimating");
152                             //device.removeClassFromElement(element, "transition");
153                         }
154                         
155                     }
156                     return endFn;
157                 },
158                 
159                 _doTransition: function() {
160                     var prop, destination, properties, i;
161                     properties = this._endPoints.getProperties();
162                     for(i = 0; i !== properties.length; i += 1) {
163                         prop = properties[i];
164                         destination = this._endPoints.getPropertyDestination(prop);
165                         this._transEl.setStylePropertyValue(prop, destination);
166                     }
167                 },
168                 
169                 _isTransitionInstant: function() {
170                     var instant = this._ownTransitions.areAllDurationsZero();
171                     instant = instant || this._endPoints.shouldSkip();
172                     instant = instant || this._isThereNoChange();
173                     return instant;
174                 },
175                 
176                 _isThereNoChange: function() {
177                     var targetProperties, prop, i, changed, self;
178                     
179                     function targetDifferentToCurrent(prop) {
180                         var current;
181                         current = self._transEl.getStylePropertyValue(prop);
182                         return (self._endPoints.getPropertyDestination(prop) !== current);
183                     }
184                     
185                     self = this;
186                     changed = false;
187                     targetProperties = this._endPoints.getProperties();
188                     for(i = 0; i !== targetProperties.length; i +=1) {
189                         prop = targetProperties[i];
190                         changed = changed || targetDifferentToCurrent(prop);
191                     }
192                     
193                     return !changed;
194                 }
195             }
196         );
197     }
198 );
